channel.title: Refactoring on VGALTES blog
channel.description: Recent content in Refactoring on VGALTES blog

item.title: Using MediatR as a refactoring strategy
item.description: Let me introduce you to Rachel, the new developer of the team. Rachel is an excellent developer eager to make a huge impact on the team and the organisation. When Rachel lands in the team, they treat them very well. They show her all the facilities, they teach her on how to make a good coffee with the new and shiny coffee machine and they even deploy to production in her first day.
